title: Workplace from Facebook
description:
Workplace is a communication tool that connects everyone in your company, even if they’re working remotely. Use familiar features like Groups, Chat and Video Calls to get people talking and working together. Be more productive by integrating your favorite apps from Microsoft, Google, Dropbox and more. And get peace of mind from industry standard security certifications.
Use Workplace to:
- Connect everybody - Make video calls, send instant messages and work on projects whether you’re at home, in the office, or on the shop floor.
- Talk to everybody - Share important updates in Groups, capture people’s attention with Live Video, and measure the impact with Insights.
- Engage with everybody - Join conversations with comments and reactions, get feedback in Polls, and use Auto-Translate to include non-English speakers.
- Work with everybody - Create Groups for your teams or projects, and use them to share updates, files, videos, photos, ideas and more.
- Access for everybody - Securely connect people on desktop and mobile, even if they don’t have an email address.
Your Workplace account is kept totally separate from Facebook. That means you own your data, and we won’t show you ads. Workplace has industry standard security certifications so you can communicate and collaborate with confidence.
